page.title: 17My Home
page.content: My home is a brick semi_detached house.It is about forty years old.The house number is ninety_three.My front door is green.Our back door is too.Our next door neighbours are Mrs.Baldwin and Mr.and Mrs.Cooper.When you go in the front door you come to the stairs.Our house has eight rooms.First we will go into the living_room.We have a colour T.V. and a three_piece suite.We have a small wall unit and an airing cupboard.My favourite chair is the recliner.Now let's go into the kitchen.Mum has a gas cooker and a fridge.My bedroom is very big.I have a record player and a portable television.Justin's bedroom has a stereo and bunk_beds.In Mum's and Dad's room there is a double bed and a huge wardrobe. by Leighton Grove. Age 10.
